Been an astronomy buff since I was a little kid.  Bought my first telescope when I was 41.  It was a beautiful thing!  Meade 8" LX90 Schmidt-Cassigrain design.  Just unboxing it gave me a thrill!  Luckily, it was a clear night that night, and I was able to set it up, get it all aligned, then let the computer do it's thing!  Jupiter and Saturn  and a quarter moon were all in the sky that night.  Was absolutely speechless viewing both planets and realizing what I was seeing was real!  

Anyways. . . Looking forward to seeing these images!
